statements: SELECT * FROM conflict_resolution_teams;
SELECT team_name, team_leader FROM conflict_resolution_teams;
SELECT team_id, team_name, team_leader, team_members FROM conflict_resolution_teams;
SELECT * FROM conflict_resolution_teams WHERE team_id = 1;
SELECT team_leader, team_name, team_id FROM conflict_resolution_teams ORDER BY team_name DESC;
SELECT team_id, team_name, team_leader, team_members FROM conflict_resolution_teams WHERE team_id > 100 ORDER BY team_name DESC LIMIT 5;
SELECT * FROM conflict_resolution_teams WHERE team_leader IS NOT NULL AND team_members LIKE '%Alice%' OR team_members LIKE '%Bob%';
SELECT team_name AS name, COUNT(team_members) AS num_members FROM conflict_resolution_teams GROUP BY team_name HAVING COUNT(team_members) > 3;
SELECT team_name, ARRAY_LENGTH(team_members) AS num_members FROM conflict_resolution_teams WHERE ARRAY_LENGTH(team_members) > 2 ORDER BY num_members DESC;
SELECT team_id, team_name, team_leader FROM conflict_resolution_teams WHERE team_leader IS NULL OR team_members IS NULL ORDER BY team_id ASC LIMIT 3;
SELECT * FROM team_members;
SELECT id, name, role, email FROM team_members ORDER BY name DESC;
SELECT name, role FROM team_members WHERE role = 'Manager';
SELECT * FROM team_members WHERE id IN (1, 3, 5);
SELECT * FROM team_members WHERE name LIKE 'J%';
SELECT name, role, email FROM team_members WHERE role = 'Developer' ORDER BY name ASC;
SELECT name, email, role FROM team_members WHERE role = 'Manager' ORDER BY email DESC;
SELECT * FROM team_members WHERE role = 'Designer' AND name LIKE 'A%' ORDER BY name ASC, email DESC;
SELECT name, email FROM team_members WHERE role = 'Developer' OR role = 'Manager' ORDER BY role DESC, name ASC;
SELECT tm.name, cr.date, cr.resolution FROM team_members tm INNER JOIN conflict_resolution cr ON tm.id = cr.team_member_id WHERE cr.date > '2021-01-01' ORDER BY cr.date DESC, tm.name ASC;
SELECT * FROM team_members ORDER BY member_name ASC;
SELECT member_name, member_role FROM team_members WHERE member_role = 'Developer';
SELECT conflict_name, conflict_status FROM conflicts WHERE conflict_status = 'open' ORDER BY conflict_name DESC;
SELECT resolution_conflict_id, resolution_description FROM resolutions WHERE resolution_date >= '2022-01-01';
SELECT resolution_id, resolution_date FROM resolutions ORDER BY resolution_date DESC;
SELECT * FROM team_members WHERE member_role = 'Developer';
SELECT member_name, member_role FROM team_members ORDER BY member_name DESC;
SELECT conflict_name, conflict_description FROM conflicts WHERE conflict_status = 'open';
SELECT resolution_id, resolution_conflict_id, resolution_description, resolution_date FROM resolutions WHERE resolution_date > '2022-01-01';
SELECT member_name, member_role FROM team_members WHERE member_id IN (1, 3, 5);
SELECT * FROM ConflictCases;
SELECT case_name, case_status FROM ConflictCases;
SELECT case_id, case_name, case_description FROM ConflictCases WHERE case_status='Open';
SELECT member_name, member_role FROM TeamMembers;
SELECT task_description, task_status, assigned_to FROM TeamTasks WHERE task_status='Pending';
SELECT * FROM ConflictCases WHERE case_status = 'Open';
SELECT case_name, case_description FROM ConflictCases WHERE case_status = 'Closed';
SELECT * FROM TeamMembers WHERE member_role = 'Manager';
SELECT member_id, member_name FROM TeamMembers WHERE member_email = 'manager@example.com';
SELECT t.task_description, m.member_name FROM TeamTasks t JOIN TeamMembers m ON t.assigned_to = m.member_id;
SELECT * FROM Table1;
SELECT team_member, conflict_resolution_task FROM Table3;
SELECT id, task_description FROM Table4 WHERE team_member='Alice';
SELECT * FROM Table2 ORDER BY id DESC;
SELECT team_member, task_status FROM Table5 WHERE task_status='Completed';
SELECT conflict_resolution_task, team_member FROM Table1 ORDER BY id DESC LIMIT 3;
SELECT team_member, conflict_resolution_task, id FROM Table2 WHERE resolution_status = 'pending';
SELECT task_description FROM Table4 WHERE id = 5;
SELECT team_member, conflict_resolution_task, id FROM Table3 WHERE team_lead = 'John Doe';
SELECT * FROM Table5 WHERE task_status = 'completed' ORDER BY id ASC LIMIT 5;
